section.title: Starting a FlyMine query
section.para: The following options are available to start a FlyMine query:

para.ulink: Start a new query with a particular class

listitem.para: Begin a query using a previous query (Only available if you have queries stored in your query history)

para.ulink: Search using a list of identifiers

listitem.para: Perform a query using IQL (advanced usage.)
